definitions.definition: depict (someone or something) in a work of art or literature.
examples: the author wanted to portray a new type of hero
synonyms: render More"she portrays the older architecture of her province"describe
tell of "the Newfoundland portrayed by Proulx"

definitions.definition: (of an actor) represent or play the part of (someone) on film or stage.
examples: he tossed his affable TV persona aside to portray a merciless mobster
synonyms: appear as; formalpersonate "the actor portrays a spy"

definitions.definition: describe (someone or something) in a particular way.
examples: the book portrayed him as a self-serving careerist
synonyms: tell of "the Newfoundland portrayed by Proulx"
